EmailTemplate.name: ENG-VDI-Nurture.ENG-VDI-Early-01.01-n-Dimension-e-book
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Datacenter Beyond Human Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/openstack-pt-1?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early01]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your data center is more complex than you give it credit for. With a multitude of resources (CPU, RAM, IOPs, NetIO, Balloon, Swap, Buffer, Flow...) whose utilization can assume a multitude of states affecting performance, how do you find a state that satisfies all of the inherent tradeoffs? What about when we add hybrid cloud, containers or webscale application architectures? All of these tradeoffs combine to create an n-dimensional problem beyond human scale. Are you chasing the right problem? Click below to learn more. <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/VMTurbo_The-Desired-State-eBook.pdf?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-VDI&utm_content=Early01]]> -The VMTurbo Team
